name: Souls Store
description:
Pitch

"Make life miserable. Corrupt. Make wishes come true... In the most upsetting form" Demon guide for beginners. You have 30 years to rehabilitate yourself in the eyes of hell bosses... You have one small town and handful of good-willed citizens ... by now. Will you succeed?

Controls

- RMB - Move camera
- Space - Pause / Unpause
- Esc - Pause menu

This project was created as a Jam participation in Ludum Dare 44 by the group of Scream School Unity Pro spring 2019 course students.
